thread.title: Investigate Allegations Against The Commission Immediately - Samia Nkrumah Charges EC
thread.title_full: Investigate Allegations Against The Commission Immediately - Samia Nkrumah Charges EC - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Investigate Allegations Against The Commission Immediately - Samia Nkrumah Charges EC
text: Former National Chairman of the Conventions People's Party ( CPP ), Samia Nkrumah has called on the Electoral Commission (EC) to hold an independent investigation into the allegations leveled against the Commission by some political parties.
